SysCfg.title:
Backup or Restore the device configuration. Be aware, the backup file is NOT encrypted.
Store it on a safe place to avoid loosing your access credentials...

Backup.title: Backup Settings
Backup.desc: Save the config to a backup file.

Restore.title: Restore Settings
Restore.desc: Click and choose your file from your local device to be restored.
Restore.invalidFile: The file you selected is not a valid backup file...
